prompts: Show me a water-type Pokemon with sleek blue fur and a playful demeanor.
Create a Pokemon that resembles a duck but is more aggressive and powerful.
Imagine a creature that thrives in aquatic environments and has a unique swimming ability.
Design a Pokemon with a long tail and webbed feet for fast movement in water.
Give me a blue Pokemon that can use psychic powers and has a mischievous personality.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon that can manipulate water and has a calm presence.
Make a creature that combines features of a duck and a ninja for stealthy attacks.
